name: Get To The End
description:
The objective of the game is to collect enough money to buy tools and get your lemmings (green boxes) to the end of the level (orange box).

NOTE: in current state should be played in 1280 x 720 resolution.

Controls:

- Right Mouse Button = speed up time

- Escape = pause

There may still be some game breaking bugs. Currently no way to quit besides forcing it.
